message.message: The 'Codewars Stats and Infos' Chrome extension provides advanced statistics on a searched user and additional information on the current Codewars challenge. With this extension, you can easily access user statistics, including the number of completed kata and the overall ranking. Whether you're looking to improve your own Codewars rank or get insight into other users' progress, the 'Codewars Stats and Infos' extension has you covered.
message.description: La description de l'extension en anglais
